author: dion
msg: Fix for post tag sending params as part of the query string.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for listening to SWT events via a simple <onEvent> tag which simplifies responding to different events enormously. This SWT stuff is pretty elegant.

author: jstrachan
msg: removed an unnecessary style attribute from the demo

author: jstrachan
msg: Added an initial implementation of JellySWT which is an XML language for creating rich user interfaces using SWT.
